title: TDD: Add parser edge case tests (nested generics, unicode)
TDD: Add tests for CLI diff command (0% coverage)
Epic: Post-Review Fixes Wave 2
description:
Address remaining issues from second code review:
- CLI entry point broken
- No working examples
- Missing adapter abstraction
- Add coverage reporting
- Fix minor code issues
close_reason: All wave 2 fixes complete: CLI fix, examples, coverage, adapters, code cleanup

title: Fix CLI entry point export
description:
The icetype package CLI has broken import:
- packages/icetype/src/cli.ts imports from '@icetype/cli/dist/cli.js'
- This path is not exported in @icetype/cli package.json
Fix the export or import path
close_reason: Fixed CLI export path - added ./cli export to @icetype/cli

title: Add working examples
description:
Create examples/ directory with:
1. examples/basic-usage/ - Simple schema definition and validation
2. examples/iceberg-export/ - Export schema to Iceberg metadata
3. examples/typescript-codegen/ - Generate TypeScript types
Each should have README and runnable code

title: Add coverage reporting
description:
Configure vitest coverage:
- Add vitest.config.ts at root
- Configure v8 coverage provider
- Add coverage scripts to package.json
- Set coverage thresholds

title: Fix minor code issues
description:
From code review:
1. Remove unused PACKAGE_JSON_ADDITIONS in init.ts
2. Fix hardcoded VERSION in cli.ts - read from package.json
3. Add noUnusedLocals/noUnusedParameters to tsconfig
4. Add explicit return types to async functions

title: Add adapter abstraction layer
description:
Create packages/adapters with:
- SchemaAdapter interface
- AdapterRegistry class
- Move Iceberg/Parquet to adapter pattern
This enables future multi-backend support (ClickHouse, DuckDB, etc.)
close_reason: Created @icetype/adapters package with SchemaAdapter interface and registry

title: TDD: Add Why IceType comparison documentation
TDD: Add tests for CLI generate command (46% coverage)
Epic: IceType Production Readiness
description:
Final push to production readiness:
- Add tests for @icetype/adapters
- Build documentation site
- Publish to npm
- Add more backend adapters
close_reason: All production readiness tasks complete: adapters tests (103), docs site, npm prep, ClickHouse adapter (69 tests), DuckDB adapter (90 tests)

title: Add tests for @icetype/adapters
description:
Write comprehensive tests for the new adapters package:
- Test SchemaAdapter interface implementations
- Test AdapterRegistry (register, get, list, has, unregister)
- Test IcebergAdapter transform and serialize
- Test ParquetAdapter transform and serialize
- Test factory functions

title: Build documentation site
description:
Build the Fumadocs documentation site in apps/docs:
- Getting started guide
- Schema language reference
- CLI documentation
- API reference for each package
- Deploy to Cloudflare Workers

title: Prepare npm publish
description:
Prepare packages for npm publishing:
- Add LICENSE file at root
- Add repository/homepage to all package.json files
- Add CHANGELOG.md
- Verify package.json metadata complete
- Test npm pack for each package
- Document publish process

title: Add ClickHouse adapter
description:
Create @icetype/clickhouse adapter:
- ClickHouseAdapter implementing SchemaAdapter
- Generate CREATE TABLE DDL from IceType schema
- Type mappings (IceType -> ClickHouse)
- Support for MergeTree engine family
- Partition by directive support

title: Add DuckDB adapter
description:
Create @icetype/duckdb adapter:
- DuckDBAdapter implementing SchemaAdapter
- Generate CREATE TABLE DDL from IceType schema
- Type mappings (IceType -> DuckDB)
- Support for Parquet file integration

title: TDD: Add tests for CLI validate command (0% coverage)
TDD: Standardize CLI error handling patterns
TDD: Add tests for core type guard functions
TDD: Add PostgreSQL adapter to main icetype package exports
TDD: Add tests for CLI iceberg command (0% coverage)
TDD: Refactor CLI to use adapter registry pattern
TDD: Add --help support to all CLI subcommands
TDD: Add E2E tests for successful CLI workflows
Epic: IceType Post-Review Improvements
description:
Comprehensive improvements based on 5 parallel reviews:
- General Code Review: 3 critical, 7 major, 12 minor issues
- Architectural Review: Missing adapter interface, package split needed
- Testing Review: Zero tests, ~4,050 lines recommended
- TypeScript Review: Unsafe assertions, missing strict flags
- Product/Vision Review: CLI stubbed, README overclaims

title: Critical Code Fixes
description:
Fix 3 critical issues from code review:
1. Unsafe UUID generation using Math.random instead of crypto
2. Missing error handling in file operations
3. Uncaught parse errors can crash CLI
close_reason: All child issues completed: UUID fix, error handling, parse errors

title: Fix UUID generation
description: Replace Math.random-based UUID with crypto.randomUUID() in packages/iceberg/src/metadata.ts

title: Add file operation error handling
description: Add try/catch and proper error messages for all file read/write operations in CLI commands

title: Handle parse errors gracefully
description: Ensure parser errors don't crash CLI - provide helpful error messages with line/column info
close_reason: ParseError class implemented with line/column info

title: CLI Schema Loading
description:
Implement proper schema file loading for CLI commands:
- Currently uses hardcoded example schemas
- Need to support .ts, .js, .json files
- Commands: generate, validate, iceberg export

title: Test Suite Implementation
description:
Add comprehensive test coverage:
- Parser tests (tokenizer, type parsing, relation parsing)
- Validation tests (schema validation, error messages)
- Type inference tests
- Iceberg/Parquet generation tests
- CLI command tests
Target: ~4,050 lines of test code
close_reason: Test suite complete: 411 tests across core, iceberg, cli

Improve type safety:
- Replace unsafe type assertions with proper guards
- Add noUncheckedIndexedAccess to tsconfig
- Add branded types for IDs

close_reason: TypeScript improvements completed - strict checks, branded types, type guards added

title: Documentation Accuracy

Update README to accurately reflect current state:
